steps: step 1: Navigate to /
step 2: Hover over item object2
step 3: Click on link brandNames (GooglePixel) -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 4: Click on link GoToCart2 -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 5: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
step 6: Click on input Email
step 7: Enter input value in input Email
step 8: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 9: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress
step 10: Fill in shipping address details for checkout
step 11: Enter input value in input City
step 12: Click on input State
step 13: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress2
step 14: Enter input value in input State
step 15: Click on input Phone
step 16: Enter input value in input Phone
step 17: Click on div DeliveryInformation
step 18: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 19: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 20: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
